entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 12:04 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.2°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: S 30 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
